overview: Led by Chris Burns and his cocky young associates, the bellhops in the RAM-YOR-ROD-A Motel are more than willing to please, so the "special services" they render won't be found in any travel guide! Follow the hot X-rated exploits of these anxious studs as they give Room Service Plus to a wide assortment of horny, male guests (not to mention each other), including a super-hot bridegroom, who has an extra-special "tip" for the very grateful bellhop!
title: Room Service Plus
